issue.title: [C++] Clarification needed between ArrayBuilder::Init(), Resize() and Reserve()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2826](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2826). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's still not clear to me why we have three builder methods that seem to do essentially the same thing. This should be clarified somewhere in the docstrings.
